newsitem.title: USA: Open Environment to restate certain results.
newsitem.headline: Open Environment to restate certain results.

text.p: Open Environment Corp said Friday that it was restating certain financial results and added that it reduced the level of 1996 revenues in particular.
In a release Friday the company said that it reduced the levels of 1996 revenues which it had recognized in connection with sales to its distributor Ingram Micro Inc.

Open Environment said the effect was reduced revenues in the first quarter of 1996 to $3.2 million from $4.28 million, and increased revenues in the second quarter of 1996 to $3.61 million from $2.76 million.

The company said its aggregate net loss in the first quarter 1996 increased to $4.97 million from $4.05 million, and the net loss decreased in the second quarter 1996 to $7.68 million from $8.39 million.
Open Environment added that it will mail the proxy statement/prospectus in connection with its proposed acquisition by Borland International Inc to stockholders on or about October 15, 1996.
The company decided to restate certain financial results after discussions with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission during its review of Open Environment's proxy statement.
Open Environment said in the release that it agreed with Borland to extend the completion date of the merger to November 25, 1996 from October 31.
